title: Visiting Sick Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Visiting Sick Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Visiting Sick Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 147
items.translation: Never mind, may it (the sickness) be a purification, if Allah wills.

items.title: Dua 148
items.arabic: ((أَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ الْعَظيمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ أَنْ يَشْفيَكَ)) (سبع مرات).
items.translation: I ask Allah The Supreme, Lord of the magnificent throne to cure you’.(7times) (he (the sick person) will be cured.)

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء المريض
